name: SuperLite 1500 Series: Anokodokonoko Endless Season
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

In simulation game "ANOKODOKONOKO ENDLESS SEASON", you have to befriend and become lovers with a girl within the given time. In single-play story mode, you have to meet, befriend and become lover with a girl, then overcome various challenges to obtain happiness within six months. Even after a successful confession you have to overcome all kinds of ordeal and find your own happy ending.

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
